  • Uses of AbstractRoom in me.desertfox.dgen

    Methods in me.desertfox.dgen that return AbstractRoom
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AbstractRoom
    AbstractDungeon.safeClaim(Class<? extends AbstractRoom> roomClass, String schematicName, org.bukkit.Location start)
    Tries to claim a room on a given location if:
    - The room wouldn't hit another room
    - The start location is on the grid

    To actually see the physical room you need to call placeDown()
    AbstractRoom
